The exception from comment 1 is covered by bug 64345. The NPE could be a
different problem.

I can confirm that the considered fixes for bug 64345 made the NPE disappear,
while it was reproducible before.

Cannot reproduce on I200406072000. The second stack trace is exactly the one
from bug 64345 - I assume the exception in comment 0 was a follow up to the
first exception.

Marking as dup as the fix for bug 64345 also fixes this.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 64345 ***
